sources.title: The Dream Kids (1944)
sources.description: It's the dead of winter and Crow is alone in the frigid tundra. He happens upon Fox's cabin, but finds his host less than hospitable. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-dream-kids-1944/

metadata.Plot: During a cold winter's night, the Fox goes to bed and starts dreaming abut his vixen girlfriend, but the Crow sees this in his own dream and steals the Fox's girlfriend from his dream, leading to a bunch of horrible and crazy antics.
metadata.Actors: Sara Berner, Frank Graham, Earl Keen
